overview:
Imagine Rugby is a social network platform where rugby fans can meet, read blog posts about rugby and find the latest in news and scores. The Imagine Rugby site is powered by the Imagine Sports Network that houses such sites as Imagine Soccer, Imagine Tennis, and Imagine Golf Club.

Our site offers many aspects of rugby including rugby union and rugby league scores and updates on tournaments like the Rugby World Cup and the Six Nations tournament.

Rugby fanatics can register on the site to converse with others about rugby news and upcoming tournaments. There’s also a shop where rugby apparel and equipment could be purchased. An all in one place for rugby fans, imagine rugby is an excellent place for any rugby enthusiast.
